summary: This bill, the Department of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026, appropriates funds for various government departments and related agencies.  It allocates billions of dollars towards workforce training, education, healthcare access, and social services.  Key areas include funding for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, impacting areas like employment programs, public health initiatives, and student aid.  The bill also includes general provisions concerning various aspects of the programs it funds.
